thread.section_title: Amba Hotel Charing Cross - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding!
thread.title_full: Outstanding! - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Boycekid7
title: Outstanding!
text:
An absolute gem of a hotel. Staff are amazingly friendly, free minibar, great breakfast and a location that cannot be beaten. I will be going back.
Upon arrival we were given a Guinness and a glass of prosecco. Our room was on the first floor and was very modern, nice big TV, huge bed and lovely bathroom. Two beers and a wine in the minbar as well as water and soft drinks that were topped up the next day. Breakfast is available up to 11am and is a buffet as well as a menu (free for both), food is lovely and not greasy at all (which usually happens with breakfast buffets). The location is ideal, Leicester Square is a short walk away and the hotel is next to embankment underground so you really can't beat it.
Genuinely one of the nicest places I've stayed in. Easily in my top 5 and I've been to many a hotel. Great stay.
